about.title: ABOUT THE TEAM
about.subtitle: RACING EXCELLENCE SINCE 2022
about.description: Chennai Turbo Riders is India's premier Formula 4 racing team, founded in 2022 with a singular mission â€” to put Indian motorsport on the global map. Based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, CTR competes in the Indian Racing League with a diverse roster of talented drivers from India and around the world.
about.description2: Our team combines cutting-edge engineering with raw racing talent, creating a powerhouse that consistently challenges at the front of the grid. From the streets of Goa to the circuits of Mumbai, CTR delivers heart-pounding performance every race weekend.

carSpecs.name: GEN-2 F4
carSpecs.tagline: ENGINEERED FOR SPEED. BUILT FOR VICTORY.
carSpecs.description: The Gen-2 F4 is a purpose-built formula racing machine that delivers exceptional performance on both permanent circuits and street tracks. Its lightweight carbon fiber construction and aerodynamic design make it one of the most competitive cars in the Indian Racing League.

drivers.quote: Every lap is a chance to prove myself and represent Chennai on the global stage.
drivers.biography: Aqil Alibhai is a talented young Indian driver who has made a name for himself in national karting championships. With his transition to formula racing with Chennai Turbo Riders, he brings fresh energy and determination to compete at the highest level in the Indian Racing League.
careerHighlights: IRL Rookie of the Year contender
Fastest lap at Madras International Circuit

drivers.quote: Precision and speed - that's what wins races. I give 100% every single time.
drivers.biography: Shibin Yousaf is a rising star in Indian motorsport with a background in single-seater racing. His technical understanding of the car and smooth driving style make him a formidable competitor on both street and permanent circuits.

drivers.quote: The track is where I belong. Every race is a step closer to championship glory.
drivers.biography: Tijil Rao brings experience and consistency to Chennai Turbo Riders. With years of competitive racing under his belt, he has developed into a reliable points scorer and a driver who excels in high-pressure situations.

drivers.quote: Breaking barriers and proving that talent has no gender. I race to inspire.
drivers.biography: Laura Camps Torras is a Spanish racing driver who brings international experience to Chennai Turbo Riders. Her aggressive yet calculated racing style and technical feedback have made her an invaluable asset to the team's development program.

drivers.quote: Racing is in my DNA. I'm here to win and make Chennai proud.
drivers.biography: Viswas Vijayaraj is a dynamic young driver who has quickly made his mark in the Indian Racing League. His fearless approach and natural racing instincts have earned him respect from competitors and fans alike.

drivers.quote: Formula 4 is where champions are made. I'm ready for the challenge.
drivers.biography: Shane Chandaria is a promising young talent competing in the Indian F4 Championship with Chennai Turbo Riders. His dedication and natural speed make him a driver to watch in the junior formula category.
careerHighlights: Rising star in junior formula racing

drivers.quote: Every race is a learning experience. I'm here to grow and compete.
drivers.biography: Veer Sheth is a young Indian driver making his mark in the F4 Championship. His smooth driving style and technical approach showcase his potential for a bright future in motorsport.

drivers.quote: Breaking barriers and racing towards my dreams with determination.
drivers.biography: Kareen Kaur is a talented female driver competing in the Indian F4 Championship. Her presence in the championship represents a new era of diversity in Indian motorsport and inspires young racers across the country.
careerHighlights: Pioneering female driver in Indian F4
